name: Unrelenting Force
effects: Fus - Staggers enemies
Fus Ro - Staggers and pushes enemies back
Fus Ro Dah - Massive force pushes enemies away
description: The signature Thu'um of the Dragonborn. Shouts enemies back with the force of a dragon's voice.

name: Fire Breath
effects: Yol - Breathes fire dealing 50 damage
Yol Toor - Breathes fire dealing 70 damage
Yol Toor Shul - Breathes fire dealing 90 damage
locations: Throat of the World - Paarthurnax teaches (Shul)
description: Inhale air, exhale flame, and behold the Thu'um as inferno.

name: Whirlwind Sprint
effects: Wuld - Sprint forward rapidly
Wuld Nah - Sprint forward very rapidly
Wuld Nah Kest - Sprint forward extremely rapidly
description: The Thu'um rushes forward, carrying you in its wake with the speed of a tempest.

name: Become Ethereal
effects: Feim - Ethereal for 8 seconds
Feim Zii - Ethereal for 13 seconds
Feim Zii Gron - Ethereal for 18 seconds
description: The Thu'um reaches out to the Void, changing your form to one that cannot harm, or be harmed.

name: Dragonrend
effects: Joor Zah Frul - Forces dragons to land and drains their vitality
description: Your voice lashes out at a dragon's very soul, forcing the beast to land. Created by mortals, dragons cannot learn this shout.

name: Marked for Death
effects: Krii - Drains 75 armor and 25 health per second for 30 seconds
Krii Lun - Drains 150 armor and 50 health per second for 40 seconds
Krii Lun Aus - Drains 225 armor and 75 health per second for 60 seconds
description: Speak and let your voice herald doom, as an opponent's armor and lifeforce are weakened.

name: Slow Time
effects: Tiid - Slows time by 50% for 8 seconds
Tiid Klo - Slows time by 70% for 12 seconds
Tiid Klo Ul - Slows time by 90% for 16 seconds
description: Shout at time, and command it to obey, as the world around you stands still.

name: Call Dragon
effects: Od Ah Viing - Summons Odahviing to fight for you
description: Calls the dragon Odahviing to fight by your side. Can only be used outdoors.
